Text: Thanks very much. I'm familiar and experienced with the install procedures but each time I'm told the Authorization Code is not valid. I've uninstalled, rebooted, and reattempted multiple times. I have followed the usual steps to disconnect Internet. Any help will be appreciated.
@jgwJGWii - Wrong serial is still in your registry. After uninstall please clean your registry.
So before I do anything, we have to uninstall Vegas first?
